mapper.sql: id, phone_number, driver_name, register_time, balance, gender, car_id, is_following, work_status, head_img, city_code, bind_time, use_status, cs_work_status, sign_status, update_time
mapper.select: select AVG(grade) from tbl_evaluate_driver where driver_id=#{driverId}
select count(*) from tbl_order where driver_id=#{driverId} and status > 2 and status < 7

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_driver_info AS driver LEFT JOIN tbl_car_info AS car ON driver.car_id = car.id WHERE driver.city_code = #{cityCode} AND driver.use_status = 1 AND driver.sign_status = 1 AND car.car_level_id = #{carType} AND driver.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT driver_id FROM ( SELECT t1.driver_id, date_add( t1.order_start_time, INTERVAL - t3.car_service_before_interval MINUTE ) AS time1, date_add( t1.order_start_time, INTERVAL t3.car_service_after_interval MINUTE ) AS time2 FROM `tbl_order` AS t1 LEFT JOIN tbl_order_rule_price AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.order_id AND t2.category = 0 LEFT JOIN tbl_car_dispatch_distribute_interval_set AS t3 ON t3.city_code = t2.city_code AND t3.service_type_id = t2.service_type_id WHERE t1.STATUS > 1 AND t1.STATUS < 7 ) t where (#{startTime} >= t.time1 and #{startTime} < t.time2) or (#{endTime} > t.time1 and #{endTime} <= t.time2) or (#{startTime} <= t.time1 and #{endTime} >= t.time2) AND driver_id IS NOT NULL )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_driver_info (phone_number, driver_name, register_time, balance, gender, car_id, is_following, work_status, head_img, city_code, bind_time, use_status, cs_work_status, sign_status, update_time ) values (#{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isFollowing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{csWorkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into tbl_driver_info
phone_number,
driver_name,
register_time,
balance,
gender,
car_id,
is_following,
work_status,
head_img,
city_code,
bind_time,
use_status,
cs_work_status,
sign_status,
update_time,

#{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update tbl_driver_info
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_following = #{isFollowing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_status = #{workStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bind_time = #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cs_work_status = #{csWorkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sign_status = #{signStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_driver_info set phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_following = #{isFollowing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_status = #{workStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bind_time = #{bindTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cs_work_status = #{csWorkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign_status = #{signStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
